01.speaker: Narrator
01.text: Ọmọtẹmi steps into the shrine, and at once, the air crackles with electricity. Thunder rumbles in the distance as the storm god’s presence looms. Before her, a corridor of shifting lightning awaits.
01.scene_description: The walls pulse with red-hot energy, and flashes of lightning strike unpredictably. The path ahead is dangerous and unrelenting.

options.text: Mo máa gbé ojú mi sókè kí n gbèrò kíá ṣáájú kí n tó rìn.
options.translation: I will study the pattern of the lightning before stepping forward.

options.text: Kò sí àkókò fí mi nì. Mo máa sare kọjá.
options.translation: There is no time to waste. I will rush through!

options.text: Mo máa fi agbara mi lo. Ṣàngó kò ní ṣàkóbá fún ẹni tó lagbara.
options.translation: I will use my strength. Ṣàngó does not punish the strong.

01.life_spirit_hint: Ṣàngó respects strength, but a wise warrior knows when to be cautious.

02.speaker: Narrator
02.text: Ọmọtẹmi carefully watches the lightning’s rhythm and finds the safest moments to move. She dashes between the strikes, reaching the other side unharmed.
02.scene_description: She breathes heavily, but she has proven her patience and awareness.

options.text: Mo ṣetan fún ìpèníjà tó kàn!
options.translation: I am ready for the next challenge!

03.speaker: Narrator
03.text: Ọmọtẹmi braces herself and pushes forward with sheer determination. The lightning strikes dangerously close, but she withstands the heat and force.
03.scene_description: Her body tingles with the energy of Ṣàngó’s storm, but she does not falter.

fail_01.speaker: Narrator
fail_01.text: Ọmọtẹmi rushes ahead without planning, and the lightning strikes her with full force. She collapses to the ground, dazed and in pain.
fail_01.scene_description: The storm rejects the reckless. This is a painful lesson.

options.text: Mo gbọ́. Mo máa gbìyànjú lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí.
options.translation: I understand. I will try again.

04.speaker: Narrator
04.text: As Ọmọtẹmi reaches the inner sanctum, flames roar from towering pillars. The heat is unbearable, but she must prove her endurance.
04.scene_description: The fire blazes, and the only way forward is through it.

options.text: Mo máa fi ìbàṣepọ̀ mi pè Ṣàngó kí ó mú kí ina yìí fẹ̀.
options.translation: I will call upon my bond with Ṣàngó to lessen the flames.

options.text: Mo máa jiya. Ifẹ̀ Ṣàngó kò ní jẹ́ kí n bàjẹ́.
options.translation: I will endure the pain. Ṣàngó’s favor will protect me.

options.text: Mo máa wá ọna yókù. Kò sí òun tó dé ibi yìí tí kò ní ọ̀nà miran.
options.translation: I will find another way. There must be another path.

04.life_spirit_hint: Ṣàngó is fire and fury, but even fire yields to respect and power.

05.speaker: Narrator
05.text: Ọmọtẹmi kneels and utters a prayer to Ṣàngó. The flames soften, bending in recognition of her connection to the storm god.
05.scene_description: She walks through unharmed, the fire swirling gently around her.

options.text: Mo ṣetan fún ipari idánwò yìí.
options.translation: I am ready for the final trial.

06.speaker: Narrator
06.text: Ọmọtẹmi clenches her fists and pushes forward. The flames sear her skin, but she does not stop. She emerges, battered but victorious.
06.scene_description: Her breath is ragged, but she has proven her strength.

options.text: Mo ṣetan fún ipari idánwò yìí.
options.translation: I am ready for the final trial.

fail_02.speaker: Narrator
fail_02.text: Ọmọtẹmi hesitates, searching for another way, but the flames only grow stronger. The hesitation is punished, and she stumbles back, weakened.
fail_02.scene_description: There is no escape. She must go through the trial, or fail.

options.text: Mo gbọ́. Mo máa gbìyànjú lẹ́ẹ̀kan sí.
options.translation: I understand. I will try again.
